snippet.title: New quantum gravity effect, dark energy, accelerating universe, black hole and experimental scheme using superfluid Helium and atom interferometer
snippet.description: New quantum gravity effect, dark energy, accelerating universe, black hole and experimental scheme using superfluid Helium and atom interferometer / Xiong, Hongwei Considerable attention has been focused on Verlinde's recent work, claiming that Newton's gravity is not a fundamental force. [...] arXiv:1101.0525. \- 2011\. Preprint

snippet.title: Magnetic dynamics of simple collective modes in a two-sphere plasma model
snippet.description: Magnetic dynamics of simple collective modes in a two-sphere plasma model / Essen, Hanno A plasma blob is modeled as consisting of two homogeneous spheres of equal radius and equal but opposite charge densities that can move relative to each other. Relative translational and rotational motion are considered separately. [...] arXiv:1007.0216.- 2010 - 19 p. \- Published in : Phys. Plasmas 12 (2005) 1222101 External link: Preprint

snippet.title: Microscopic dynamics of molecular liquids and glasses : Role of orientations and translation-rotation coupling
snippet.description: Microscopic dynamics of molecular liquids and glasses : Role of orientations and translation-rotation coupling / Theenhaus, T ; Schilling, R ; Latz, A ; Letz, M We investigate the dynamics of a fluid of dipolar hard spheres in its liquid and glassy phase, with emphasis on the microscopic time or frequency regime. [...] cond-mat/0105393. \- 2001\. - 26 p. Access to fulltext document
